title: Library Contract Request: Elsevier ScienceDirect at North Carolina A&T University

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) The most recent contract, governing, base, or master license agreement with Elsevier, a subsidiary of RELX, relating to the product ScienceDirect;

2) All related terms and conditions, terms of service, amendments, addenda, appendices, attachments, product terms, MOUs, MOAs, data processing agreements, and/or letters of intent; and

3) All financial documents or records of financial transactions, exchanges or obligations related to contractual relations with Elsevier for ScienceDirect. 

Please do not limit your search to strictly direct agreements or renewals between the institution and Elsevier, but include all agreements and related documentation through consortia such as the Carolina Consortium or Lyrasis.

Responsive materials include all contracts, agreements, amendments, appendices, invoices, and any other documents listed above that incorporate language governing terms of use of ScienceDirect.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ellen Dubinsky

title: Library Contract Request: ProQuest Ebook Central at the University of Texas-Austin

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) The most recent contract, governing, base, or master license agreement with ProQuest (Clarivate) relating to the licensing of Ebook Central;

2) All related terms and conditions, terms of service, amendments, addenda, appendices, attachments, product terms, MOUs, MOAs, data processing agreements, and/or letters of intent; and

3) All financial documents or records of financial transactions, exchanges or obligations related to the contractual relations with ProQuest (Clarivate) for Ebook Central licensing. 

Responsive materials include all contracts, agreements, amendments, appendices, invoices, and any other documents listed above that incorporate language governing terms of use of Ebook Central.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ellen Dubinsky

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Communications between Mayor Daniel Lurie and Alfonso Felder  between 1/10/25 - 4/15/25, including (but not limited to) email, memos, texts, what's app messages, direct messages. 

Communications between Mayor Daniel Lurie and Noelle Duong and Arielle Fleischer between 1/10/25 - 4/15/25, including (but not limited to) email, memos, texts, what's app messages, direct messages.

Communications between Mayor Daniel Lurie and Chris Gruwell between 1/10/25 - 4/15/25, including (but not limited to) email, memos, texts, what's app messages, direct messages.

Communications between Mayor Daniel Lurie, Alicia John-Baptiste, and Aiecha Evans between 1/10/25 - 4/15/25, including (but not limited to) email, memos, texts, what's app messages, direct messages.

Communications between Mayor Daniel Lurie, Alicia John-Baptiste, and  Jill Hazelbaker between 4/10/25 - 5/6/25, including (but not limited to) email, memos, texts, what's app messages, direct messages.

Communications between Mayor Daniel Lurie, Alicia John-Baptiste, and  Alex Tourk between 4/10/25 - 5/6/25, including (but not limited to) email, memos, texts, what's app messages, direct messages.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kristi Coale, independent journalist

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am submitting a FOIA request under 5 U.S.C. § 552 for records related to the DEA’s investigation and extradition of Marc Emery from 1994 to 2015. Specifically, I request:

- All DEA case files, records, reports, emails, memos, and investigative documents related to Marc Emery. Including, but not limited to - DEA Form 6, DEA 7a, DEA-6 Attachments, and DEA Memorandum to DOJ Regarding Charging Decision.
- Correspondence between the DEA and Canadian law enforcement (RCMP, Canadian DOJ, etc.) regarding his investigation, arrest, and extradition. Include all attachments.
- Communications between the DEA, U.S. DOJ, U.S. Marshal's Service, and other agencies regarding policy or political considerations in Emery’s prosecution. Include all attachments.
- Any internal discussions on DEA enforcement priorities regarding marijuana seed sales and targeting of Marc Emery. Include all attachments.

Best,
Patrick McConnell

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Patrick McConnell
